name: Plugin Name: Hello Dhamma
author: Brother Noah Yuttadhammo

sections.description:
Displays a random verse from the Dhammapada on the admin dashboard in the same way as the “Hello Dolly” plugin. Actually, it’s just the “Hello Dolly” plugin with the lyrics replaced by the Dhammapada.

Hello Dhamma

Contributors: yuttadhammo
Tags: dhamma, Buddhism, Buddha wisdom, meditation
Requires at least: 2.0.2
Tested up to: 3.1
Stable tag: 1.1

Displays a random verse from the Dhammapada in the same way as the “Hello Dolly” plugin. Actually, I just replaced the lyrics with the Dhammapada.
sections.installation: Install, activate, refresh dashboard page. Notice verse at the top. For more information, see the “Hello Dolly” plugin.
sections.faq:
Which version of the Dhammapada is this?

It is the author’s wish, however, that any such republication and redistribution be made available to the public on a free and unrestricted basis and that translations and other derivative works be clearly marked as such.
